name.baseName: Full accounting link (for wastewater) ; Printed matter (substrate is paper), printed matter (other substrates) ; Paper, other substrates ; Lithographic printing, gravure printing, letterpress printing (flexographic printing), stencil printing (screen printing), digital printing ; All sizes; NESPS2
全部核算环节（废水用） ; 印刷品（承印物为纸）、印刷品（其他承印物） ; 纸、其他承印物 ; 平版印刷、凹版印刷、凸版印刷（柔性版印刷）、孔版印刷（丝网印刷）、数字印刷 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + chemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + chemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集用于各种不同底材（包括纸张和其他材料）的印刷工艺的环境评估，包括平版印刷、凹版印刷、凸版印刷（柔性版印刷）、孔版印刷（丝网印刷）和数字印刷技术，适用于所有规模的操作。此外，还包含了用于管理废水中污染物（如石油相关废物和氨氮）的末端处理技术。末端处理包括物理处理、化学处理和好氧生物处理，以及它们各自的效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码23,三级代码231.0文件，在完整版文件中第521页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysical treatment + chemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management100，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是物理处理法+化学处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为100，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(废水处理设备额定功率（千瓦）×废水处理设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法，其效率为97，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(废水处理设备额定功率（千瓦）×废水处理设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为印刷品（承印物为纸）、印刷品（其他承印物），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management41，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法，其效率为41，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(废水处理设备额定功率（千瓦）×废水处理设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment + chemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management66，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理处理法+化学处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为66，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(废水处理设备额定功率（千瓦）×废水处理设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + chemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物理处理法+化学处理法+好氧生物处理法，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(废水处理设备额定功率（千瓦）×废水处理设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
